outline.en:
"This course focuses on examining the ways organizations satisfy consumer and organizational needs and wants for products and services. Emphasis is placed on how the elements of the marketing mix are used to provide customer satisfaction in the marketing of goods and services, both locally and globally.
1. Introduction to marketing
2. Analyzing the marketing Environments
3. Consumer markets and consumer buyer behavior
4. Business markets and consumer buyer behavior
5. Identifying market segments and targets
6. Products, services, and brands
7. New product development and product life-cycle
8. Pricing strategies
9. Marketing channels, retailing, and wholesaling
10. Integrated marketing communications
11. Advertising and public relations
12. Personal selling and sales promotion
13. The global marketplace
14. Sustainable marketing"
